attributes.action: adapt roads a few miles outside the M25 to form an outer ring road suitable for buses and cyclists as well as other traffic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An outer ring route would give shorter, more efficient links between towns around London than either the M25 or the existing patchwork of disjointed roads. Improving existing roads to give a route compatible with buses and cyclists would give more these a faster, more efficient and convenient route as well.
